checkersMain
Class CheckersBoard.Ply

java.lang.Object
  checkersMain.CheckersBoard.Ply
Enclosing class:
CheckersBoard
public static final class CheckersBoard.Ply
extends java.lang.Object

A package class for a possible ply that can be taken for a CheckersBoard. The Ply stores its index in the CheckersBoard plyList from the method CheckersBoard.getPly(int). It also has an array representing the indices of the move. The first index is always the index of the Checkers piece that will be moved. The last index is always the index of the Checkers piece after the move. Any indices in between the first and last indices indicate indices the Checkers piece will move to in between jumps for a multiple-jump ply.

Version:
1.00 - 3 August 2008
Author:
Amos Yuen
See Also:
CheckersBoard.getPly(int)
